meanings.definition: A small, carnivorous mammal native to Africa, resembling a skunk in appearance and emitting a strong odor when threatened.
meanings.sent1: The zorilla scurried through the bushes in search of food.
meanings.sent2: I saw a zorilla at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The zorilla sprayed its scent to protect itself from danger.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was so strong, it reminded me of a zorilla's odor.
meanings.sent5: The zorilla's black and white fur made it stand out in the wild.
